reviews.text: I've been there one night at the end of September. Even trying to forget the fact that upon arrival (I had no reservation) I've been told a price for the room and 5 minutes later another woman at the reception tried to sell me the same room at a higher price, I cannot rate positively this hotel. Maybe because of an ongoing fair, but the price of the room was extremely high (345€) and didn't include the breakfast (+19€). Well, in a nice hotel in the city centre you can expect that the rates are high, but... but this could have been valid 20 years ago! Except for the LCD tv in front of the bed everything looked very old, some lamps were out of order and, terrible surprise after a long flight, the soap dispenser in the bathroom was almost empty and anyway broken. Only two positive facts: the room was quiet although the hotel was almost full and it was clean.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel... 20 years ago!

reviews.text: In conclusion, a place where I wouldn't stay again, unless they cut their prices by 70%.
reviews.title: Maritim Stadthotel, Hannover

reviews.text: I really enjoyed my stay at the Dormero. The hotel is very new and clean. The staff are all excellent. Very polite and spoke excellent English. The breakfast is excellent. A very nice selection of fruit and breads. I found the beds very comfortable. It is in easy walking distance to the 'new' town hall. The Ubahn station is about a one minute walk from the hotel and on the same street. You can turn left or right from the hotel to enter the Ubahn station from either end. You go two stops and you are in the heart of Hannover. The rooms are a very good size. The shower is really big. The internet is free. You have one screen on the wall for the televison and one screen for the internet. They have all kinds of funky lights in the room. You can select the brightness and the color of the lights. A tip, if the window is open the air conditioning will not operate. Even when it did it did not cool the room very well. It was rather disappointing considering the age of the hotel. There is parking attached to the hotel (surcharge).
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in an excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really enjoyed this hotel. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful. Great service. The hotel is very modern, very clean and comfortable. A great stay.
reviews.title: New, clean and friendly

reviews.text: I have stayed there few times during my business trips. Perfect location, fabulos brekfasts, internet access and mini bar included into price. Nice clean rooms. Hotel is modern, high service level, everything is lovely. I would strongly recommend this hotel. Since I was there first time I always choose that hotel during my stays in Hannover.
reviews.title: The best in Hannover

reviews.text: Fantastic gym, and the food was wel prepared and tasty, if a little limited for choice.
reviews.title: Excellent facilities and restaurant- poor service when busy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are very modern with customisable mood lighting, two large plasma screens (one for internet one for media) iPod connectivity and wifi. However service was very slow - 45 mins to deliver missing bottle opener. Will try this hotel again in future as they may have been exceptionally busy.
reviews.title: What a great new addition to Hannover's hotels!

reviews.text: The Dormero was still very new when I stayed there. The floor in the lobby wasn't even done. This was also reflected in other areas as some things just didn't work the way they were supposed to. But the essential things: cleanliness, service and sleep quality were high and that is most important in my eyes.
reviews.title: Very modern and good location
